actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to group-term life insurance purchased for employees.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $50,000 to $100,000 the amount of group term life insurance which employers may purchase for employees without including it within the latter's taxable income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to group-term life insurance purchased for employees.
